WorkflowInfo.Name: Change management procedure
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process requests for approval to perform an activity from 2 different managers. Only if both approved, the approval is sent. Otherwise everyone are notified which manager did not approve. This procedure should be initiated as a result of external email alert, in which the subject holds the request information.
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ConditionalWait;Assembly=ConditionalWait, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:TerminateWorkflow;Assembly=TerminateWorkflow, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:Terminate;Assembly=Terminate, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="0" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Manager1_Approve" x:Name="memorySet3" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="0" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Manager2_Approve" x:Name="memorySet4" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /><ParallelActivity x:Name="parallelActivity1"><SequenceActivity x:Name="Manager1"><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="300" Subject="Manager 1 - do you approve the request" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="SendEmailToManager1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:05:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16428"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>%subject%<BR>To approve reply yes</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"><ns3:ReturnValue Value="yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="1" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Manager1_Approve" x:Name="memorySet1" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"><ns3:ReturnValue Value="" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="DefaultBranch" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="300" Subject="Manager 1 did not approve" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail2" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:05:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="Admin" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="1" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>Manager&nbsp;1 did not approve</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /><ns4:TerminateWorkflow IsValid="True" x:Name="terminateWorkflow1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TerminationReason="Manager1 did not approve" Description="Terminate entire workflow" DisplayName="Terminate Workflow" TypeName="TerminateWorkflow" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity><SequenceActivity x:Name="Manager2"><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="300" Subject="Manager 2 - do you approve the request" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="SendEmailToManager2" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:05:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">

<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>%subject%<BR>To approve reply yes</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity3"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity5"><ns3:ReturnValue Value="yes" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue5" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","yes")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns0:MemorySet IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" VariableValue="1" DisplayName="Set Memory" IsAppend="False" VariableName="Manager2_Approve" x:Name="memorySet2" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsSaved="False" /><ns5:Terminate IsValid="True" x:Name="terminate1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TerminationReason="Terminate this branch" Description="Terminate the current branch in workflow" DisplayName="Terminate" TypeName="Terminate" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity6"><ns3:ReturnValue Value="" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue6" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="DefaultBranch" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="300" Subject="Manager 2 did not approve" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:05:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="Admin" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="1" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">

<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>Manager 2 did not approve</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /><ns4:TerminateWorkflow IsValid="True" x:Name="terminateWorkflow2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TerminationReason="Manager2 did not approve" Description="Terminate entire workflow" DisplayName="Terminate Workflow" TypeName="TerminateWorkflow" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequenceActivity></ParallelActivity><ns1:ConditionalWait IsValid="True" x:Name="conditionalWait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Conditional Wait" TimeInSeconds="600" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Wait until the specified condition is true" MaxTimeout="True" TypeName="ConditionalWait" TimeValue="" Condition="%Manager1_Approve%=1 and %Manager2_Approve% = 1" Timeout="00:10:00" /><ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Manager 3 - Request has been approved" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail4" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=windows-1252" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 11.00.9600.16428"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">Request has been approved by manager1 and 
manager2 </BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
